description: The Anti-Drone Revolver is an OmniCorp "sidearm" with a carbine length barrel and overcharged electrothermal action, designed to defeat the heaviest among armored drones. Comes with a classic finish in wood.
//: This and specially the AMR are inspired by this fictional hand cannon: https://eyedivinecybermancy.fandom.com/wiki/444_Bear_Killer
//1: Longer barrel than the L2037 Backup: 330 mm/13 in
//2: very inefficient but can take down tank drones with about 8 shots.

description: OmniCorp bullpup ER555 platform uses hypervelocity 5.56 ETC rounds in several roles. The base model on its own is a highly accurate battle rifle with a "pulsed" two-round burst mode. Supports aftermarket modifications, but using its conversion kits instead is advised.

OmniCorp bullpup ER555 platform uses hypervelocity 5.56 ETC rounds in several roles. The Anti-Drone Sniper features an overcharged electrothermal action. Comes with integrated forward grip/bipod unit, gyroscopic stabilizer and cheek pad.

OmniCorp bullpup ER555 platform uses hypervelocity 5.56 ETC rounds in several roles. The Carbine supports automatic fire, has an integrated recoil stock and foregrip, with room for one more underbarrel accessory.
//: The Anti Drone Revolver uses the same barrel as this carbine

description: OmniCorp bullpup ER555 platform uses hypervelocity 5.56 ETC rounds in several roles. The Close Quarters Battle variant supports automatic fire, comes with integrated recoil stock, underbarrel laser sight and RM42I bayonet.

OmniCorp bullpup ER555 platform uses hypervelocity 5.56 ETC rounds in several roles. The Squad Automatic Weapon supports ammo belts, has a reinforced barrel, a very high rate of fire and comes with integrated forward grip/bipod unit, recoil stock, ported barrel and gyroscopic stabilizer.
//: Sort of like a FAMAS in rate of fire.

description: OmniCorp bullpup ER555 platform uses hypervelocity 5.56 ETC rounds in several roles. Not that accurate or long ranged for a Sniper Rifle, but unlike most, has a two-round burst mode. Comes with integrated forward grip/bipod unit, gyroscopic stabilizer and cheek pad.
//: The second round will almost always miss at long ranges because 'SIMULTANEOUS' does nothing yet.

description: OmniCorp bullpup ER555 platform uses hypervelocity 5.56 ETC rounds in several roles. The Urban Drone Destroyer is very powerful, fast firing but difficult to control in full auto. Comes with integrated recoil stock, ported barrel and gyroscopic stabilizer.
